attributes.action: Make all MPs have a mandatory drug test.
attributes.additional_details: With the surge of claims of drug abuse and drug dealing in Parliament, I don’t feel safe that the people running the country and representing the populous should be able to get away with the crimes that the ordinary person doesn’t.
attributes.background: Each MP, whether Labour, Conservative or SNP should take a mandatory drug test and the result released to the public

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609273
